title: Procedure
step_title: Drawing Water from the Patriot Facility Water Tanks

steps.step: Water Tanks Designate which tank the water/oil mixture will be pulled from.
Shut outlet ball valve and inlet butterfly (wheel) valve to chosen tank(s).
Connect truck hose to external piping o Outside Of the process containment area.
Once truck is connected to the water/oil draw piping, discharge (outlet) valve located at the bottom of the designated water tank and instruct driver to valve to truck.
Verify liquid is flowing through piping and hose.
Instruct truck driver to start the truck pump to begin unloading the designated water tank.
Once the truck tank is full, the driver will shut off pump.
Once the pump is shut off. dose outlet valve on tank, valve on unloading pipe and bleed pressure from hoses before disconnecting.
